name: .VOL File Extension
summary: Learn about .VOL files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: VOL files are not meant to be opened. Instead, the game packaged with the VOL file references it to load its contents.

However, players or modders sometimes extract the contents of a VOL file to modify or replace game assets. For example, you can use Dragon UnPACKer to unpack assets in VOL files in Windows. However, not all games using VOL files support modification, and editing these files may corrupt them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
